actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Twin Blade attacks and one Hooves attack or it makes four Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/120' one target 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Twin Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: War Surge
bonus_actions.desc: When the quagga reduces a creature to 0 hp with melee attack on its turn the quagga can move up to half its speed and make a Twin Blade attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

special_abilities.name: Knife Dancer
special_abilities.desc: When the quagga hits a creature with Twin Blade attack it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it moves out of that creature's reach.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the quagga moves at least 20' straight toward a target and then hits it with Twin Blade attack on the same turn that target must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the quagga can make one Hooves attack vs. it as a bonus action.
